reviewComments: This is a real pumpkin farm where you can ride out to the field and pick your pumpkin out of the field. So much to do and eat! Family tradition for fall!!!!!!
Really enjoyed our visit today. Liked that we did not have to pay parking (see schedule for days that have fees). Lots of things for us to do - We are grown ups looking for fun... read more

This place is a must every fall. Ive been here every year I can remember and my daughter hasnt missed one yet! Bishops is a family tradition!

Out in the middle of nowhere is this very cool pumpkin farm (way more than just a farm) excursion that is well worth a visit... at any age!

The play was well done, had a good message, and was timed and paced well for young children. Farm pigs were the sometime uncooperative actors along with Mother Goose and a farmer.
